long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get definitions and synonyms without asking Google!

Definitorium is a Chrome extension which gives you the definition you need for that stubborn word you stopped at, without you leaving the page or doing any kind of spiritual incantation.

All you have to do is to select the word and then click the Definitorium icon and that's it! You have your definition right there !

Hurray !
